Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial project setup: つばめSRS design documents

- CLAUDE.md: Project overview and core design decisions

- .claude/skills/: DB schema, API spec, CSV import, LLM integration specs

EOF
\)")
